Title: Christmas PIN #0036 Signed GOLD CROWN Bell & Santa Moveable Figural ~Gold Plated
Description: 0036 For your consideration, this is a Gently Used Christmas PIN: Signed GOLD CROWN Bell & Santa Moveable Figural ~ Gold Plated ~ HOLIDAY Pin/Brooch This is a very beautiful Gold Plated pin. It has a little SANTA at the top of a chimney holding a bell that has a tiny little clapper in it. The Santa head is fastened with a tiny spring which makes his head moveable. The Holly leaves are green enamel. This very RARE pin is designed by GOLD CROWN and is part of the Gold Crown Inc Christmas Pin Collection. There is no wear on this pin at all and looks like no one has ever worn it.Size approximately: 1 3/4 inches tall X 7/8 inch wide. Please see picture for more accurate detailing & feel free to ask questions. Actually, it looks nicer then the picture shows. This is gently used and is in excellent, like new condition.
